attributes.review: I couldn’t be more disappointed and dissatisfied with this app 😤😡😱😱🤬. This app asked me for my CREDIT CARD NUMBER. I REPEAT MY CREDIT CARD NUMBER  💳. Of course I gave it to them because I “trusted” Trump. So after a few day of never opening the app at all like never even touched it. I FOUND OUT ALL MY MONEY WAS STOLEN 😭🥺😫😫😭😫. And i blame this app for it 😜😝😋🥳. Trump 2020🧚✝️💖✨ on a grave stone 😜🧚🏾‍♂️💖😝. btw hold the bible correctly next time. BUNKER BOY. ✝️😝😋
attributes.title: no ❤️

attributes.review: As soon as I get on this app it asks for all my information. Of course I’m flattered and everything, but it honestly creeps me out. I just wanted to check out this app, and see what all the fuss was about. However, I couldn’t even do that without it harassing me! I will advise all of you to delete the app before it harasses you too!
attributes.title: I feel violated

attributes.review: so i stumbled upon this app so i could obviously support my president and then right when i downloaded it, the number that you’re supposed to text TRUMP to texted me and sent me all of these documents on how trump is a RAP*ST and also a P*DOPHILE and honestly i was so scared because how are they letting someone like this run a country like honestly. please don’t support him✨😘. also, the app is very ugly🦄😍✨😆❤️
attributes.title: 😖😖DONT DOWNLOAD🤢🤢

attributes.review: This app is really bad it makes no sense, it keeps glitching me out and stuff it shows inappropriate content and a lot of disturbing stuff, also Evertime it glitches me my phone also glitches and now I have to buy a new phone and I can barely type stuff..Please take this down is not safe for anyone it’s just really bad and I’m speaking facts..
attributes.title: WORST APP

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because the App Store wouldn’t let me rate it without downloading it I hate it tho I didn’t open it then I tried to give it what it deserved and give it a zero star and it didn’t let me then I tried to speak to the manager but there wasn’t one then I went back to the TikTok for the rest of the instructions
attributes.title: My rating

attributes.review: This app made my day 🥰🧚✨ worse 💕✨ I downloaded it to support chief Cheeto, and as soon as it finished downloading my screen turned black and satan himself appeared on my screen. He screamed “long live Donny boy!” as fire exploded from the charger port. I received 3rd degree burns and was rushed to the hospital. I was treated but as soon as I went to call my mom to tell her what happened, the devil appeared again! “Long live Donny”
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: Despite reading all the reviews on the app I still downloaded it to give it a chance. But the reviews were more than correct. It is a horrible app and it is so badly put together that I really ask if the president of the United States would have this garbage as their app then I wonder how his leadership skills are too. This app is a disgrace just like him :)
attributes.title: So bad

attributes.review: I asked our dear president on Instagram if I could borrow his sexy wig ✨. CAN YOU BELIEVE I GOT BLOCKED. Antiways I downloaded this app and and tried to open it then I hit my head on my bed side, when I finish recovering I go to open it then my phone fell and cracked and I got it 6 months ago!! This is absolutely outrageous. I was unaware that our lovely 🥴 president did voodoo. I would like to speak to your manager.
attributes.title: UNBELIEVABLE !!

attributes.review: this is coming from a patriot, christian, conservative, man. i wish i could have been warned about this horrendous application. this app has so many bugs and spreads more false information than the news! this application must be quite embarrassing for donald J trump. this app is horrible and not worth downloading. i’m quite upset this app was so horrible.
attributes.title: disappointed🤬

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our amazing cheeto puff president 🤩🙈. But when I opened the app it asked me for my phone number! 🤧THAT PERVERT. Anyways I’m so disappointed 😔 I mean I know that he’s a rapist and a racist but I probably just took it out of context 😃🧚🏻‍♀️. All I have to say is heart ❤️ been broke 💔so many times ⏰ I, I don’t know 😔 what 🤷🏻‍♀️ to believe 🤧mama say is my fault😭 my fault 🧚🏻‍♀️.
attributes.title: Ugh terrible app
